name: Chronic Advance
description:
Chronic Advance is a problem solving game where you create cycles to create infinite energy. 

Controls:
Left-mouse: Drag barriers to position them
Space: Start/Reset stage (R to just reset)
ESC: Return to menu/Quit

Assets used that required attribution. All assets not included in this list are either attributed in the executable itself, created by myself, or in the public domain:
https://opengameart.org/content/life-pickup-yo-frankie
https://opengameart.org/content/bow-arrow-shot

These credits would be included in the game in a potential post-jam release.

Known Issues:

  • The ball can get stuck in a generator gate. Slightly changing the angle at which it enters it can resolve it.
  • Records currently don't get saved (or not properly loaded, at least it doesn't work), they therefore only display the current session.
  • 2A: One of the gates launch at half speed
  • 2B: One of the gates do not generate energy (makes the level longer to count as completed than intended)
